name: …And Music's There… (中文版)
album_name: 日日夜夜…我最爱的顺子
lyric:
爱情从不曾给我 太多的时间练习
Loneliness does
期待转变成空虚 每当我需要勇气
Music 总在耳边细语
So tell me 还有你
Music's always there
Music always cares
For me for you
Music's always fair
Music always dares
To see us through
快乐好像只愿意 永远都保持距离
Please don't leave me
心碎失去的角落 想哭却不能掩饰
My music 跟着心跳旋律
安慰我 别哭泣
Music's always there
Music always cares
For me for you
Music's always fair
Music always dares
To see to see us through
Like a voice 在心里
不放弃 让所有美丽有结局
Open eyes 释放情绪
闭上眼 让烦恼随歌声渐渐散去
Cause music's always there
Music always cares
For me and for you
Music's always fair
Music always dares
To see dare to see us through
Music's always there always there always
And music always cares
For me as it cares for you
Music's always fair
Music always dares
To see us
To see us saw through
To see us saw through

comments.brief:
给深夜里烦恼着的人们

来自iPhone客户端

author.name: 虾米用户
author.motto: 爱  是生命的和弦，而不...
